name: Minna de Taisen Puzzle: Shanghai Wii
overview: Popular classic puzzle "Shanghai" appeared in matchup puzzles! "Shanghai" is a simple rule puzzle game where you take two pairs of mah-jong tiles of the same pattern. Everyone can play happily. "Everyone in Shanghai" will hold a mah-jong tile stacked in the middle with everyone. Get an item if roulette stops! Item The person who was attacked shake the remote control! You can reduce item effect time. People with high points win. "Shanghai by yourself" is a mode where you can play the most thoroughly. Take it by chain, group, serial number and score further! When it comes to the high score, you can compete with the players nationwide by connecting to the Nintendo Wi - Fi connection. (Google translated from the official Japanese WiiWare listing)
